name.baseName: Contaminated Cd agricultural soil remediation;Phytoremediation;Sedum plumbizincicola;Monitoring during and after remediation;Soil Sample
农田镉污染土壤;植物修复;伴矿景天;修复后监测;土壤样品

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 采集土壤样品进行检测，以验证修复效果。
Collect soil samples for testing to verify the remediation effect.

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Instead of clarifying specific locations, the paper indicated that contaminated agricultural field was located in Southern China.
文献中仅明确指出，污染农田位于中国南方，没有具体给出省市

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: 7 sample per hectare, according to HJ/T 166 ＆GB 15618. In total, 7 times of monitoring is conducted, including 5 times during remediation and 2 times after remediation.
根据HJ/T 166和GB 15618，每公顷7个样品。共监测7次，其中修复期间监测5次，修复后监测2次，共采集土壤样品49个进行分析检测。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set represents the process of phytoremediation in contaminated agricultural soil using the hyperaccumulating plant Sedum plumbizincicola. It is applied for the purpose of reducing cadmium (Cd) contamination within farmlands, particularly in South China. The process includes monitoring soil quality during and after the phytoremediation to assess the effectiveness of the remediation. The data is intended for life cycle assessment studies and can be applied to research related to soil remediation techniques, ecological restoration projects, and environmental policy development.
该数据集代表了使用超累积植物伴矿景天(Sedum plumbizincicola)对被镉(Cd)污染的农田土壤进行植物修复的过程。 它被应用于减少中国南方农田内镉污染的目的。该过程包括在植物修复期间和之后监测土壤质量，以评估修复的有效性。该数据用于生命周期评估(LCA)研究，并可应用于与土壤修复技术、生态恢复项目和环境政策制定相关的研究。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Process inventory data were obtained in accordance with ISO 14040 on LCA.35 Primary data were obtained from site-specific pot experiments, pilot studies, and vendors, which were representative of situations in Southern China. Secondary data were obtained from the Ecoinvent database v2.3, from which processes of the most similar geographic origin and technological factors are selected.
初级数据清单是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，从中选择了地理来源和技术因素最相似的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Jin, Y. et al. Integrated Life Cycle Assessment for Sustainable Remediation of Contaminated Agricultural Soil in China. Environ. Sci. Technol. 55, 12032–12042 (2021).
Jin, Y. et al. Integrated Life Cycle Assessment for Sustainable Remediation of Contaminated Agricultural Soil in China. Environ. Sci. Technol. 55, 12032–12042 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), users should ensure that the data reflects the specific geographic context of Southern China. Soil samples should be collected in accordance with HJ/T 166 and GB 15618 standards, and the LCA model should account for seven soil samples per hectare across seven monitoring events. Primary data from pot experiments, pilot studies, and vendors should be considered, while secondary data should be sourced from the Ecoinvent database v2.3 with attention to geographic and technological similarities. The publication time of the primary literature should be considered the start of the validity period. Users should also verify remediation effects through the analysis of collected soil samples and adapt LCA inputs accordingly.

在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估(LCA)时，使用者应确保数据反映了中国南方的具体地理环境。土壤样本的采集应符合HJ/T 166和GB 15618标准，LCA模型应计入每公顷7个土壤样本，跨越7次监测事件。应考虑来自盆栽实验、中试和供应商的一手数据，二手数据应根据地理和技术相似性，从Ecoinvent数据库v2.3中获得。初始文献的发表时间应被视为有效期的开始。用户还应通过分析采集的土壤样本来验证修复效果，并相应地调整LCA输入。

completeness.common:other: All maior raw materials and all the essentialenergy is ncuded.
输入输出流包括所有主要原材料和所有必要的能源消耗

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 这里是采集的土壤样品数量，一共采集土壤样品49个，用于实验室检测
